message: Bob, let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This offer won't be as generous in future rounds.
Let's meet in the middle, 55/45 is a fair split considering the depreciation.
Bob, time is running out! I'll agree to a 52/48 split. Take it before inflation eats away at the value even more.
Inflation is hitting us hard, I think 58/42 is more than fair now.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous!  I'm taking a hit here, but let's end this. 48/52 - final offer.
